notification.body: Discover the latest and enhanced features in the new FUT Card Creator 3D update! Showcase your creativity with unique card designs and enjoy free ads to boost your experience. ✨
notification.extTitle: 🎖️ Unlock Exclusive Features with FUT Card Creator 3D 🎖️
notification.extSummary: Upgrade now to get FUT Card 3D and save your designs to the gallery with just one tap! Don't miss out on free ads for an even better gaming experience!
